oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Datenbank über Pflanzenstärkungsmittel im Internet
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Marx, Dr. Peggy
Kühne, PD Dr. Stefan
Jahn, Dr. Marga
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop health, quality, protection
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In 2005 a database about plant strengthening products will be established in the world wide web. Information about the effects and the field of applications will be provided. The complience of the composition of the products with the guidelines of organic farming is reviewed. The database is useful for the farmers as well as for scientists, advisors and also for the consumers. It anables a quick access to relevant information.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Marx, Dr. Peggy; Kühne, PD Dr. Stefan and Jahn, Dr. Marga (2005) Datenbank über Pflanzenstärkungsmittel im Internet. [Database about plant strengthening products in the internet.] In: Heß, J and Rahmann, G (Eds.) Ende der Nische, Beiträge zur 8. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, kassel university press GmbH, Kassel.
